input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

dataset_name.description: The name of this dataset, used in output files and within visualisations

input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment. TODO: finish samplesheet

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

mod_method.description: The method used to call the RNA modification

diff_method.description: The method used to call differentially expressed sites

min_reads.description: Minimum reads needed at a site (across all samples) to be called

prob_threshold.description: Minimum probability detected at a site to be called
